data.SOURCE:
@AccessControl.authorizationCheck: #NOT_REQUIRED
@EndUserText.label: 'Online Pos Başlık Verileri'
@Metadata.ignorePropagatedAnnotations: true
define root view entity YOP_DDL_I_POSDATA
  as select distinct from yop_t_posdetail

    left outer join       yop_t_bankacc    as _BankAcc    on  yop_t_posdetail.workplace_no = _BankAcc.workplace_no
                                                          and yop_t_posdetail.bukrs        = _BankAcc.bukrs
    left outer join       I_CostCenterText as _CostCenter on _CostCenter.CostCenter = _BankAcc.fincs
                                                          and _CostCenter.Language  = $session.system_language
    
  association [1..*] to YOP_DDL_I_BNKINF as _BankInfo on $projection.BankNo = _BankInfo.BankNo


{
  key yop_t_posdetail.uuid                                                                              as Uuid,
  key yop_t_posdetail.bukrs                                                                             as Bukrs,
  key yop_t_posdetail.bank_no                                                                           as BankNo,
  key _BankInfo.BankName                                                                                as BankName,
  key yop_t_posdetail.workplace_no                                                                      as WorkplaceNo,
  key yop_t_posdetail.terminal_no                                                                       as TerminalNo,
  key yop_t_posdetail.transaction_date                                                                  as TransactionDate,
  key yop_t_posdetail.value_date                                                                        as ValueDate,
  key yop_t_posdetail.process_type                                                                      as ProcessType,
      _CostCenter.CostCenterDescription                                                                 as WorkplaceDesc,
      yop_t_posdetail.acc_document                                                                      as AccDocument,
      yop_t_posdetail.card_no                                                                           as CardNo,
      yop_t_posdetail.card_type                                                                         as CardType,
      yop_t_posdetail.provision_apr_code                                                                as ProvisionAprCode,
      yop_t_posdetail.installment_order                                                                 as InstallmentOrder,
      yop_t_posdetail.installment_number                                                                as InstallmentNumber,
      @Semantics: { amount : {currencyCode: 'CurrencyCode'} }
      yop_t_posdetail.gross_amount                                                                      as GrossAmount,
      @Semantics: { amount : {currencyCode: 'CurrencyCode'} }
      (yop_t_posdetail. gross_amount - yop_t_posdetail.net_amount - yop_t_posdetail.commission_amount ) as InterruptAmount,
      @Semantics: { amount : {currencyCode: 'CurrencyCode'} }
      yop_t_posdetail.commission_amount                                                                 as CommissionAmount,
      @Semantics: { amount : {currencyCode: 'CurrencyCode'} }
      yop_t_posdetail.net_amount                                                                        as NetAmount,
      yop_t_posdetail.waers                                                                             as CurrencyCode,
      yop_t_posdetail.file_name                                                                         as FileName,
      yop_t_posdetail.create_date                                                                       as CreateDate,
      yop_t_posdetail.create_time                                                                       as CreateTime,
      yop_t_posdetail.create_user                                                                       as CreateUser,
      yop_t_posdetail.acc_belnr                                                                         as AccBelnr,
      yop_t_posdetail.acc_create_date                                                                   as AccCreateDate,
      yop_t_posdetail.acc_create_time                                                                   as AccCreateTime,
      yop_t_posdetail.acc_create_user                                                                   as AccCreateUser,
      yop_t_posdetail.org_ref_doc                                                                       as OrgRefDoc,
      yop_t_posdetail.rev_document                                                                      as RevDoc,
      yop_t_posdetail.gjahr                                                                             as gjahr,
      _BankInfo
}
/*+[internal] {

],

"YOP_DDL_I_BNKINF"
],
